comments.body: [Sean Hsu|https://gitlab.com/sean.hsu] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/merge_requests/1235] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / api_cloudhub_panel|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel] on branch [LP1-3471|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/tree/LP1-3471]:{quote}<LP1-3471> refactor get deposit method and get withdraw method{quote}

[Sean Hsu|https://gitlab.com/sean.hsu] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/merge_requests/1236] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / api_cloudhub_panel|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel] on branch [LP1-3471|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/tree/LP1-3471]:{quote}<LP1-3471> fix: fix regular expression{quote}
Changed the status to ‘Done’. Moved all the “To Do” and “In Progress” subtasks to[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-3566|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-3566|smart-link].

The BBM/ Novox system have already released to clients on 17 Dec 2022 [https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/LP/pages/128090840/Production+Release+Note+History+-+LogixPanel+LogixCRM|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/LP/pages/128090840/Production+Release+Note+History+-+LogixPanel+LogixCRM|smart-link]. According to [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] , there’re still requirements from client’s side need to be adjusted and the story [https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-3566|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-3566|smart-link] on sprint 29 is opened for it.

fields.summary: [OPS-1039] - Activate Chinese Traditional emails from LogixPanel Admin Portal LTD & AU

issuetype.description: A small piece of work that's part of a larger task.
issuetype.name: Sub-task

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want to update and refactor of activating emails

So that I can activate emails more efficiently in LogixPanel.

{color:#ff5630}*Note:*{color}{color:#ff5630} This story is to follow up the OPS ticket {color}[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|smart-link], {color:#ff5630}which also includes activating Chinese Traditionally emails.{color}





*Background*

* In LogixPanel Admin Portal LTD & AU → Email Manager → General Email → Chinese Traditional section:
** As of Tuesday 29 September 2022, all the Chinese Traditional emails have been recently created and translated into Chinese Traditional by our colleagues (Sia Tu and Amber Ho), and have not been activated in backend for use.
* Due to the further release of Chinese Traditional language for ACY, we will need to activate these emails from backend in order to send them to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Chinese Traditional language.
* Furthermore, our Marketing team would like to get these emails tested out as upon Jimmy’s request.





*Current Investigation into email logics and outcome moving forward*

On 13 October 2022, [~accountid:61d4f155326554006c015f63] checked with [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] in regards to the feedback of activating emails from LogixPanel. There are two (2) parts that need to be updated to make this work - Client (api_cloudhub_panel) and Admin (cloudhub). There are a total of 20 templates, the latest code submitted for Client works for 5 templates, the other 15 templates on Admin still need to be coded. After investigation on Admin code, the template id logic and country logic are messy, and they are all hardcoded. To hardcode these it will take 1.5 man day, but for long term fix and refactor, it will take 3 man day.





*Reference*

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|smart-link]





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Update and refactor of activating emails from LogixPanel. [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] to provide information.
# In *LogixPanel Admin Portal ACY LTD* → Email Manager → General Email → Chinese Traditional section:
## Activate The *Chinese Traditional emails*, as {color:#36b37e}*highlighted in green*{color} within the screenshot below, should be activated in backend in order to send these emails to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language.
!LP_Admin_ChineseTraditionalEmail_LTD.png|width=2559,height=1371!
### *Note:* The Chinese Traditional email templates were copied over from all the active Chinese Simplified email templates, the Chinese Traditional emails should have trigger logics similar to Chinese Simplified emails, but would be sent to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language. {color:#ff5630}As these email templates were made awhile back, please keep in mind that some of the Chinese Traditional emails might not need to be activated. Therefore it should be cross reference with Chinese Simplified emails that are currently active.{color}
# In *LogixPanel Admin Portal ACY AU* → Email Manager → General Email → Chinese Traditional section:
## Activate The *Chinese Traditional emails*, as {color:#36b37e}*highlighted in green*{color} within the screenshot below, should be activated in backend in order to send these emails to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language.
!LP_Admin_ChineseTraditionalEmail_AU.png|width=2559,height=1371!
### *Note:* The Chinese Traditional email templates were copied over from all the active Chinese Simplified email templates, the Chinese Traditional emails should have trigger logics similar to Chinese Simplified emails, but would be sent to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language. {color:#ff5630}As these email templates were made awhile back, please keep in mind that some of the Chinese Traditional emails might not need to be activated. Therefore it should be cross reference with Chinese Simplified emails that are currently active.{color}
# Conduct QA testing by triggering some emails from both ACY LTD and AU environments. {color:#ff5630}*Note:* {color}{color:#ff5630}BE to advise which ones are supposed to be activated (as mentioned above, refer to Chinese Simplified emails as well){color}.






|*Name*|*Trigger*|
|ACY帳號管理系統登入資訊|Admin : when updating the password of trader.|
|ACY證券 - 出金申請|Client : when applying for the deposit.|
|ACY證券 - 入金申請|Client : when applying for the withdrawal.|
|ACY證券 - 交易平台帳號密碼重設|Admin : when reseting the password of account & mam account.
Client : when reseting the password of account.|
|ACY證券 - 合作夥伴申請|Client : when applying for the affiliate.|
|ACY證券 - 收到子帳戶申請|Client : when applying for the sub account.|
|ACY證券 - 收到諮詢|Not found.|
|ACY證券 - 銀行帳單通過審核|Admin : when approving the request of bank account.|
|ACY證券 - 銀行帳單審核不通過|Admin : when rejecting the request of bank account.|
|缺少ID證明|Admin : when rejecting the request of trader, it will display the button to send the email under the block of the upload file.|
|缺少地址證明|Admin : when rejecting the request of trader, it will display the button to send the email under the block of the upload file.|
|合作夥伴申請拒絕|Admin : when rejecting the request of agent.|
|忘記密碼|Client : when clicking the button of reset password.|
|ACY證券 - 諮詢回覆|Admin : when replying the ticket.|
|ACY證券 - 出金申請撤銷|Admin : when rejecting the request of withdrawal.|
|ACY證券 - 出金申請執行|Admin : when approving the request of withdrawal.|
|Affiliate 有效客戶等級| |
|Affiliate交易量等級獎勵領取| |
|代理號有新客戶開戶| |
|成功註冊參加2022點差獵人交易大賽 – 賽事啟程！|Client : when applying the TradingCUP.|

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want to add 'Japanese' email section in LogixPanel Admin Portal LTD & AU

So that we can send Japanese emails to clients.





*Background*

In the near future, ACY will start providing Japanese version for their products, which includes LogixPanel Client Portal. In order to prepare, we need to add a ‘Japanese’ email section under LogixPanel → *Admin Portal ACY LTD & AU* → Email Manager → General Email.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# In LogixPanel → *Admin Portal ACY LTD & AU* → Email Manager → General Email:
## Add in ‘Japanese’ email section {color:#ff5630}(Marketing team will add in the email templates and will require us to activate them at a later date){color}.
!LP_Japanese_Email_Section (2).png|width=1904,height=968!
# Apply to ACY LTD & AU environment.

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want to store files in S3 (AWS - Simple Storage Service), which is in the cloud, instead of local machines, when uploading files in LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal)

So that we can provide further security of these files.





*Reference*

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~62538eb7cdc240007049cc33/pages/138543105/Private+file+upload+location|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~62538eb7cdc240007049cc33/pages/138543105/Private+file+upload+location|smart-link]

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2739|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2739|smart-link]

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2740|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2740|smart-link]





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Implement files to be stored in S3 for the following file upload locations.
## *LogixPanel → Client Portal:*
### Top header, Become an Experienced Trader
###* Declare as an Experienced Trader, Confirm Account Information, Upload Documents
### Cash Management, Verify Payment Methods
###* Add Payment Methods, next, Upload Card Photos;
###* Add Payment Methods, next, Uploads Bank Statement;
### Support Ticket
###* New Ticket, Attachment
###* Detail, Replay, Attachment
## *LogixPanel → Admin Portal:*
### Trader Management -> Individual Account
###* Edit(click name), Documents, Add
###* Edit(click name), Wholesale Declaration Documents, Add
###* {color:#ff5630}-Edit(click name), Video, Add-{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}{color:#ff5630}*(Removed AC - as of 07 December 2022)*{color}
###* Edit(click name), AML&KYC, Add
### Trader Management -> Corporate Account
###* Edit(click name), Documents, Add
###* Edit(click name), Wholesale Declaration Documents, Add
###* {color:#ff5630}-Edit(click name), Video, Add-{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}{color:#ff5630}*(Removed AC - as of 07 December 2022)*{color}
###* Edit(click name), AML&KYC, Add
### Treasury -> Bank Account Approval
###* Add Account, Upload Image
### Task -> Wholesale Declaration
###* Wholesale Declaration Approval, View(check), Edit, Bank Card File
### Sales Operation -> Upload Documents
###* upload, Document
###* {color:#ff5630}-upload, Video- {color}{color:#ff5630}*(Removed AC - as of 07 December 2022)*{color}
### Compliance -> AML KYC
###* AML&KYC, Certificate
# Conduct QA testing for all the file uploading locations listed above.
## Upload and check files are being stored to S3.
# Apply to all relevant environments.

Thank you team! [~accountid:62538eb7cdc240007049cc33] [~accountid:62c24b1ee16ddfe82bdeb92f] [~accountid:61d4f155326554006c015f63]

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want penetration test to be conducted on Admin Portal

So that we can fix and improve security of this system.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Execute OWASP to scan the 'Admin Portal' and generate the Test Report
# All the pages and interactive elements display on the 'Admin Portal' ([https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/LP/pages/133333095/Logix+Panel+CRM+-+Penetration+Test+Plan)|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/LP/pages/133333095/Logix+Panel+CRM+-+Penetration+Test+Plan)|smart-link]
# For 'High' or critical risks, QA and Dev to review and create issues.
 For 'Medium' risks, they can be reviewed and followed up later.

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a compliance officer,

I want to remove the need to open and update MT4 and MT5 manager to update the ‘Status’ field {color:#ff5630}(refer to screenshot in Background part){color} 

So that I can do all the processing of a new account application in LogixPanel.





*Background*

* For example, when a lead comes through that is assigned to Unipips (our sales team for Egypt and Saudi Arabia), they need to open up MT4 Manager and edit a field called ‘Status’ as per the screenshot below.
!Picture132423423.png|width=47.4331550802139%!
Example Case above with Email: [hatm34985@gmail.com|mailto:hatm34985@gmail.com], CRM: [https://acy.crm.zerologix.com/accounts/84540|https://acy.crm.zerologix.com/accounts/84540].
** This is currently a manual process and is prone to errors if the spelling is incorrect or it is forgotten. If new team members forget this one task then it will cause an ‘internal error’.
** This is also used by Treasury for their report. Therefore accuracy is essential.
** Ultimately, the reason for this field being updated is to help easily calculate commissions for certain teams/regions via the MT4 manager.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# *In Admin Portal → Clients → Profile → Trading Accounts section:*
!Frame 1 (19).png|width=1905,height=1006!
## Change field name of ‘{color:#ff5630}Status{color}’ to ‘{color:#36b37e}Action{color}’ (as the name, ‘Status’ will be used for something else) for the following tables:
### Regular Trading Accounts
### MAM-Sub Trading Accounts
## Change field name of ‘{color:#ff5630}Status Last Modify By{color}’ to ‘{color:#36b37e}Action Last Modify By{color}’ (as the name, ‘Status’ will be used for something else) for the following tables:
### Regular Trading Accounts
### MAM-Sub Trading Accounts
!Frame 2 (3).png|width=1905,height=1006!
## The rest of the logics should remain the same.
# *In Admin Portal → Administration → Users → Edit Users Settings:*
## Add new field: ‘*Team ID*’, which should be placed between ‘Name' and ‘Email’ field. Default value is empty.
!Frame 5 (1).png|width=1902,height=968!
### Add logic: If the user’s Team ID contains ‘*MED*’{color:#ff5630} (example){color}, then it should map the *Team ID field* in trader’s profile {color:#ff5630}(refer to AC point 3.b.){color}.
## The rest of the logics should remain the same.
# *In Admin Portal → Clients → Profile:* 
## Add new column field, ‘Status’, for the following tables (under Trading Accounts section):
!Frame 3 (3).png|width=1905,height=1006!
### Regular Trading Accounts
#### Add info icon: when hover over, it should state, “Refers to Account Manager’s Team ID, which also syncs to Status field in MT4/MT5 manager.
### MAM-Sub Trading Accounts
#### Add info icon: when hover over, it should state, “Refers to Account Manager’s Team ID, which also syncs to Status field in MT4/MT5 manager.
## Under ‘System Information' section, add new field: ‘*Team ID*’, which should be placed between ‘Account Manager’ and 'Active Client’ field.
!Frame 6 (1).png|width=1903,height=1001!
### Add logic: Map the *‘Team ID’ input field* to new column field, ‘Status’, {color:#ff5630}(refer to point AC 2.a.){color} for the following tables:
#### Regular Trading Accounts
#### MAM-Sub Trading Accounts
## The rest of the logics should remain the same.
# Sync ‘Status’ field in LogixPanel to MT4 and MT5 manager through manager API.
# Implement the Chinese Simplified translation as provided in the table below. {color:#ff5630}Awaiting translations{color}
# Apply the above implementations to all relevant environments.

||*English*||*Chinese (Simplified)*||*Context*||
|Action|操作|Field Name|
|Action Last Modify By|最新审核|Field Name|
|Team ID|团队ID|Field Name|
|Status|状态|Field Name|
|Refers to Account Manager’s Team ID, which also syncs to Status field in MT4/MT5 Administrator.|指客户经理的团队ID， 也会被同步到MT4/MT5管理端的“状态”中。|Tooltip for Status field|
|Refers to the team that the Account Manager represents.|指客户经理代表的团队。|Tooltip for Team ID field|

comments.body: Hi [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] [~accountid:63351855140ba0bf651c116d], I have updated the AC with Chinese (Simplified) translations for the new fields. Thanks for updating!

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2011] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3327|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3327]:{quote}<LP1-3327>{quote}

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/merge_requests/1234] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / api_cloudhub_panel|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel] on branch [LP1-3327|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/tree/LP1-3327]:{quote}<LP1-3327> add the script of migration to account and User.{quote}

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2014] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3327|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3327]:{quote}<LP1-3327> remove the issue of double import at Repository.{quote}

In AC 4. Sync ‘Status’ field in LogixPanel to MT4 and MT5 manager through manager API.

QA only can test the sync button is workable or not , the actual data in mt4/mt5 server we don’t have access to check ,so this part need [~accountid:626f28307de1ec00695822e5] to verify when you conduct the UAT😃

Others testing QA has already finished!! so this story can go UAT NOW😇😇

[^LP1-3327-[Admin Portal] Add 'Status' and 'Team ID' fields.pdf]

[Sean Hsu|https://gitlab.com/sean.hsu] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2029] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [master|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/master]:{quote}<LP1-3327>{quote}

fields.summary: Document review for logixpanel migrating file storage to S3

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a team,

We want to write a release plan for file moving

So that we can test the plan with Devops before full implementation.





*Acceptance Criteria*

Create a release plan for file moving. It should include:

# Step-by-step work flow that includes:
##  all steps required from our BE Dev and Devops 
## list down all scripts and the sequence to run
# Provide a list of paths that need to be blocked at Nginx to Devops, so that they can prepare from their end.
# Data backup plan  (SQL backup, Repos to revert, etc )
# Revert plan
# Carry out a test together with Devops to simulate the entire file moving work flow. Estimate the cost and time required of the work flow.
fields.summary: [File Move] Write a release plan for file moving, and Test it out with Devops
[Backend] Plan for basic release/rollback steps and run-books
